name: Sky Madness
description:
AVOID MIDAIR COLLISIONS!

Be forewarned: this game may appear fun and simple, but it is deceptively tricky. A cup of coffee is recommended.

Sky Madness offers you the ultimate challenge – sorting airplanes while avoiding midair collisions.

The sky is jammed with airplanes, hot air balloons, tornadoes, birds, and whatever else. It's your job to sort them all to their correct flight levels while keeping everyone safe.

Challenge yourself to earn the 'three aircraft' badge for all 25 action-packed levels!

Despite the game's difficulty, the instructions are very, very simple: drag airplanes to their correct color-coded flight level. Avoid objects. Tap birds if they are a nuisance. Tap hot air balloons to give them fire.

Big Fat Simulations proudly offers you Sky Madness. We hope you will enjoy it!
